generated_body: If you click on the article titled "This custom Indian Scout Bobber is called the Hasty Flaming Buffalo," you may expect to read about a unique motorcycle that has been customized to stand out in terms of design and performance. The article is likely to detail the modifications made to the Indian Scout Bobber, possibly highlighting aesthetic features and enhancements that cater to motorcycle enthusiasts. Additionally, it could discuss the inspiration behind the custom name "Hasty Flaming Buffalo" and what it signifies within motorcycle culture. Overall, the piece may appeal to both bike lovers and those interested in custom automotive designs.
